---
name: create-new-project
description: Create a new project based on the template defined in this repo.
# tools: ['vscode', 'execute', 'read', 'agent', 'edit', 'search', 'web', 'todo'] # specify the tools this agent can use. If not set, all enabled tools are allowed.
---
* Activate the development environment by running `source .venv/bin/activate`.
* Use the `acme-project-create` tool to create a new project based on the template.
